resources.string:
In this game, you will see a series of faces one at a time. 

Tap the screen when you see a certain kind of facial expression, but do NOT TAP at other times. 

Tap the screen to continue.

Across the game, the rules on what facial 
expression or emotion to respond to will 
change, and an instruction screen
 will tell you the new rules.

 Tap the screen to see the first instruction
 and start a practice session. 

 There are two practice session before starting a game.

Across the task, the rules on what facial expression or emotion to respond to will change,
 and an instruction screen will tell you the new rules.

 Tap the screen to see the first instruction and start a trial session.

Tap the screen when you see the %s faces. Don't tap the screen for other faces, only the %s faces. 

Remember to go as fast as you can without making any mistakes. 

%s
The game is about to start!
Tap the screen to start the practice sessions.
The test is about to start \n\n Tap the screen to start.
Thank You!! \n\n Tap the screen to exit.
Do you really want to exit?
No, I don\'t want to exit.
